about_the_game:
WARNING: This video game may potentially trigger seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

Gameplay

Greed Stays Home is a first-person horror walking simulator. The gameplay revolves around exploration and uncovering the details of the story. The game emphasizes atmosphere, building tension, creating a sense of fear, and jump scares. The average completion time is 50 minutes.

Storyline

You play as a historian and treasure hunter. Since childhood, you've been fascinated by tales of lost paintings, gold taken during the war, and stolen jewels. However, so far, the only things you've managed to find are a few 19th-century coins and other items worth only a few pennies at the local antique shop.

For some time now, you've been researching the history of an aristocratic family from the turn of the 19th and 20th centuries, which lost a significant portion of its wealth due to a theft. The family never recovered financially after that loss. Friends and relatives were suspected, and bad luck was blamed. An innocent person was even wrongfully condemned. However, what truly captured your attention were the tragic events that unfolded in the nearby workers' village, nestled at the foot of the aristocratic estates, in the years following the theft—disappearances and other unsettling occurrences. Today, the village is nearly abandoned.

You've been wandering the area for the last few days, searching house after house. The few remaining locals give you suspicious looks, but no one bothers you. Who cares about crumbling, ownerless ruins and some lunatic with a backpack and a flashlight? Today is just another day and another house. Maybe this time, your dream will come true, and you'll find something worth more than an old shoe. And if not, at least you'll have another story to tell. After all, having a passion is what matters most.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features paranormal elements. The storyline and visuals involve some instances of violence and gore. Expect jump scares and terrifying scenes, including the presence of corpses and ghosts. We advise reasonable restrictions when selecting the game's audience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 ti / RX 5600-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A horror walking sim that emphasizes atmosphere, tension, fear, and immersive storytelling, all heightened by well-timed jump scares. The game takes place in a village frozen in time, stuck somewhere in the mid-20th century.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Korean
*languages with full audio support
